mapper.insert: insert into report (marketNo, loginId, title, reporter, reason) values (#{marketNo}, #{loginId}, #{title}, #{reporter}, #{reason})
insert into report (req_no, login_id, title, reporter, reason) values (#{reqNo}, #{loginId}, #{title} , #{reporter}, #{reason})
mapper.select: SELECT a.report_id, b.title, b.marketNo, b.login_id, a.report_date, sub.report_count FROM ( SELECT marketNo, COUNT(marketNo) AS report_count FROM report GROUP BY req_no ) AS sub JOIN report a ON (sub.marketNo = a.marketNo) JOIN market b ON (a.marketNo = b.marketNo) GROUP BY b.title ORDER BY a.report_date DESC LIMIT #{postStart}, #{postCount}

SELECT a.report_id, b.title, b.req_no, b.login_id, a.report_date, sub.report_count FROM ( SELECT req_no, COUNT(req_no) AS report_count FROM report GROUP BY req_no ) AS sub JOIN report a ON (sub.req_no = a.req_no) JOIN request b ON (a.req_no = b.req_no) GROUP BY b.title ORDER BY a.report_date DESC LIMIT #{postStart}, #{postCount}
select COUNT(*) from report where marketNo
select COUNT(*) from report where req_no
select count(*) from report where marketNo=#{marketNo}
select count(*) from report where req_no=#{reqNo}

SELECT a.req_no, b.title, a.reason, sub.reason_count FROM (SELECT reason, COUNT(reason) AS reason_count FROM report GROUP BY reason) AS sub JOIN report a ON(sub.reason=a.reason) JOIN request b ON (a.req_no=b.req_no) WHERE b.req_no=#{reqNo} GROUP BY b.title ORDER BY a.report_date

SELECT a.marketNo, b.title, a.reason, sub.reason_count FROM (SELECT reason, COUNT(reason) AS reason_count FROM report GROUP BY reason) AS sub JOIN report a ON(sub.reason=a.reason) JOIN market b ON (a.marketNo=b.marketNo) WHERE b.marketNo=#{marketNo} GROUP BY b.title ORDER BY a.report_date
